title: TFW first time playing TF and can't get the right card

replies.body:
I guess some http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=405147&type=card has happened to him and now he can't find his Gold Card. Must suck.

Yes I know I used an MTG card. SHUSH!
or he might just got attacked directly by http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/yugioh/images/3/30/GreatPhantomThief-DR1-EN-C-UE.png/revision/latest?cb=20140209041306
Why is that card not banned it has 1000 atk points and defense thats one strong card with a really strong affect since its easy to guess the name of meta cards since everyone knows them
1000 wasn't so much when I played Yugioh, has that changed?
for a level 3 card? they literally banned pot of greed just because it was draw ~~one~~ two cards for free
[DID SOMEBODY SAY POT OF GREED](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ay_S8NjPEXk)
http://m.memegen.com/hecnhv.jpg
Thank you for this gift.

Somebody activated my trap card
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/yugioh/images/7/79/JarofGreed-YS14-EN-C-1E.png/revision/latest?cb=20141124011110
sounds like the perfect card for {{champion:48}}

> [{quoted}](name=LaBoka,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JZ0B8FQT,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-10T21:38:12.339+0000)
>
> [DID SOMEBODY SAY POT OF GREED](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ay_S8NjPEXk)

But I don't get it, what does Pot of Greed do? Should I watch the video again? There's a hint in there somewhere I know it.
It lets a player draw 2 cards from his/her deck for free
sometimes it ALLOWS them to draw two new cards

you gave me this i raise you this

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OSUSqCf0mGo
Good God..... too much POT OF GREED.

Well, drawing it gives you a permanent one card advantage for free. Having 5 cards in your hand when the other guy has 4, all things being equal, is huge. Except for some really weird cases you ALWAYS want to draw it so yeah i see why its banned.
yah but its not like it doesnt work for any deck every deck can use it equally.
Yep so its in every deck and whoever draws it first is at an advantage until the other guy draws it. Which i imagine is something that would make the game less fun.

Oh damn that is a cool card due to its effect!

Too bad I play MTG now. Oh well.
Good for you, yugioh is a mess rightnow.

Yeah... I've seen those Synchro cards.... They are kinda BS...

Then again MTG has its own BS cards as well... BUT they aren't as ridiculous as those, okay some are bonkers strong like the final ability on this Planeswaker: http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=413599&type=card

Though its more enjoyable in MTG. At least with most decks it takes more then 5 turns to get going!

I think the pendulum cards are more bs..... I didn't see much, but if I recall, there's like 2 monsters you can set that isn't part of the monster field i think, I don't know if they can attack, but basically these monsters have levels on them, if you have any monsters that are between the 2 summoned pendulum monsters, you can special summon them

Haven't heard of he Pendulum cards until now...
http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=3265&type=card http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=46733&type=card

Wow those are... Kinda dick move cards in their own right.

Then again, I joined MTG during Core set M13/RTR.
Lol I don't know if we're still talking about Yugioh in my comment or MTG anymore.... Cause I was talking about Yugioh's new pendulum summon....

Well shit! The things I didn't know about. Hold on let me find one...
https://yugiohblog.konami.com/articles/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/BigTimeGazer.jpg

WTF?! ITS STUPIDLY CONFUSING JUST TRYING TO MAKE HEADS OR TALES OF IT! At least for me it is...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

So basically you can play it as a Monster in the Monster Zone or a Spell in a Pendulum Zone. It has different effects for each casting, but when it occupies a Pendulum Zone you also note the number that correlates to the pendulum side it was placed on. Once per turn you can summon as many monsters in your hand as you damn well please so long as their level is between the Red and Blue numbers in your Zones.

Well then... Glad I left Yo-Gi-Oh when I did then... Because that sounds stupid as fuck!

Then again... MTG has its fair share of bullshit, but it usually requires 2 or more cards to pull that off!
you need two pendulum monsters to do it. and most pendulum monsters have something to not keep em there, (er nvm thats mostly just amorphage which just says nope to everyone)

Ah, well then not as absurd as I though then... Are there infinite combo cards?

Like these two together in MTG: http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=376480&type=card + http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=240134&type=card

You literally heal one life with both of these on the field an you can kill your opponent.

Sounds like total bullshit to me.

Thank god for requiring Mana for spells in MTG.

Damn... Serious counter measures have been taken.

The ban list in MTG formats is relatively small depending on which format your playing  (compared to how many cards exist in that format).

There definitely have been various instances of First Turn Kill, One Turn Kill, and infinite lockdown combos in Yu-Gi-Oh. I don't know about many of them, but I'm fairly certain some combos existed that let you draw your entire deck in a single turn... which is very strong when there are cards that let you instantly win if you have all of them in your hand. Since Yu-Gi-Oh allows cards from any set to be used, they maintain a very large and active banlist to get rid of those strategies.
yeah dragunity is like that, and fire fist is kind of the same.  im running a fire fist right now and turn one i can get out an xzy and a synchro
HOLY SHIT! That is some serious bullshit! I feel sorry for you having to even go against that!
Yea, I looked into Yo-Gi-Oh after a few years after I stopped playing to see what's new... I got confused as hell when I saw these syncro-pendulum-xyz cards .--.
So much confusion once Synchro cards became normal. Then even crazier shit happens that I didn't even now about... Like the Synchro cards weren't enough insanity already?!

> [{quoted}](name=VulDread,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JZ0B8FQT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-10T20:21:13.538+0000)
>
> TF uses:
> http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/yugioh/images/f/fe/TimeWizard-DPBC-EN-C-1E.png/revision/latest?cb=20150617205548
> 
> 
> Zilean?!{{champion:26}}

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
OMG he is here! We summoned a ritoer with a yugioh card!
Get FEK and make Time Wizard your Avatar! IT WOULD BE PERFECT!
I SUMMON WOOKIECOOKIE IN ATTACK MODE
Then leona appears http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/yugioh/images/d/d8/TheSupremacySun-DL16-EN-R-UE-Red.png

http://book-of-moon-yugioh-card.com/images/ysds-en025%2050%20PERCENT.jpg
Rekted
limited and most cards now have a "cant be targeted or affected by card effects" or have a support card for it,

Which is one of the main reasons why yugioh isn't fun anymore and people barely play it, loads of overpowered bullshit that synergized ONLY with the desired cards and have super broken effects ruined the game.

I wish yugioh stopped at the first serie.
thing is theres other cards (like fire fist cardinal) who can disable that effect and make those cards explode basically. the op shit has counters but you need to learn em.
but most of the counter invincibility cards are either banned or limited, with all the synchro bullshit getting 3k monster in 2or 3 turns it really isn't fun anymore.
you can easily insta destroy those cards though. mst affects pendulum zones and you can rageki most of em and trap hole em or many other things
i personally loved yu gi oh until Syncro summoning became a thing i loved GX
@Rito Time Wizard
